result.title: Order Confirmation
result.message: Dear {customer_name}, your order #{order_id} has been confirmed. Thank you for shopping with us!

result.title: Delivery Update
result.message: Hello {customer_name}, your order #{order_id} is out for delivery and will reach you soon.

result.title: Payment Reminder
result.message: Dear {customer_name}, this is a reminder that your payment for order #{order_id} is due on {due_date}.

result.title: Promotional Offer
result.message: Hi {customer_name}, enjoy a special discount of 20% on your next purchase. Use code SAVE20.

result.title: Account Activation
result.message: Welcome {customer_name} Your account has been activated successfully. Start shopping now.

result.title: Password Reset
result.message: Dear {customer_name}, click the link to reset your password: {reset_link}. If you didn't request this, ignore this message.

result.title: Feedback Request
result.message: Hi {customer_name}, we value your feedback. Please rate your recent purchase experience.

result.title: Subscription Renewal
result.message: Dear {customer_name}, your subscription will renew on {renewal_date}. Thank you for staying with us.

result.title: Event Invitation
result.message: Hello {customer_name}, you're invited to our exclusive event on {event_date}. RSVP now!

result.title: Thank You Note
result.message: Dear {customer_name}, thank you for your recent purchase. We appreciate your business!

result.title: Order Cancellation
result.message: Dear {customer_name}, your order #{order_id} has been cancelled as per your request.

result.title: Shipping Delay
result.message: Hello {customer_name}, due to unforeseen circumstances, your order #{order_id} delivery is delayed.
